page.title: 15 CHILDREN'S HOBBIES
page.content: In the year 1985 children and teenagers often occupy themselves by going cycling. Others go to swimming lessons and girls often go to synchronised swimming lessons. Lots of girls go to Rangers, Guides or Brownies and boys go to Boys Brigade, Cubs or Scouts. Children during this year are interested in{sport.}Teachers stay behind and give those who are most interested extra lessons during lunch plays and certain days after school. Girls can go to rounders and netball and boys can go to cricket and football. Gymnastics, tennis, running, badminton, chess, music and drama are all popular at our school. Another popular{hobby}is dancing, many girls learn classical dancing, and sometimes even boys will go to disco dancing. Many children go horse riding. By Kerry Pearce and Sarah Jones.
